verbose_text: ROS, initially produced by damaged mitochondria, induce the opening of the mitochondrial membrane permeability transition pore, induce the dissipation of mitochondrial membrane potential (DeltaPsim) and block the electron transport chain, which leads to the ROS burst.
evidence: ROS, initially produced by damaged mitochondria, induce the opening of the mitochondrial membrane permeability transition pore, induce the dissipation of mitochondrial membrane potential
